Summary: A flying object flying too low, no noise, too fast. Then flying too high & fast, then disappeared going up.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cave Creek
There were no other sightings in Cave Creek on or around September 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 5am I ws outside with my boyfriend as he was leaving for the airport as he is a pilot. He noticed first "Look, that must be some type of space thing, there is no blinking lights and it is going to fast and there is no noise for as low as it is, and is to low to be an airplane". He left a minutes later, I stood outside and went to the roof, I saw the object come back in the opposite direction NORTH increase in a lot of altidude to a star like appearance still moving at an incedible speed then up and disappear. I was somewhat excited and in denial that it could be a UFO, but I could not find another explaination to what I saw. The object just moved way to fast!!!! and was to low yet to high within seconds to be anything eles.
